topic.title: Phigix - A Crank's Perspective
topic.body: Does anyone read this book? is it a fucked up guy, or he has a point.

1565256550_149W17bFN1NbQou6iE81Uq2b8wEvy.body: how about some censorship for the viewer. This thing is going to get infested by pedos and not nice people. I know you guys have good intents, but people beyond your screen not. Hence if we get some option to block an user or being able to simply use some key words to blur the comments in my end, that will be wonderful.

> [theosis](#comment_33_149W17bFN1NbQou6iE81Uq2b8wEvyqwUV1): This is already implemented (albeit poorly) in Millchan and surely will be done on my new platform. [...]

Thanks! In the past I checked retroshare platform, very similar to this one and they had the option to simply block an user so anything from that user was simply not decrypted in my end, I think that was a very good approach, click and just don't decrypt then I see nothing what they say.

> [theosis](#comment_33_149W17bFN1NbQou6iE81Uq2b8wEvyqwUV1): This is already implemented (albeit poorly) in Millchan and surely will be done on my new platform. [...]

Thanks! In the past I checked retroshare platform, very similar to this one and they had the option to simply block an user so anything from that user was simply not decrypted in my end, I think that was a very good approach, click and just don't decrypt then I see nothing what they say.

I think if you allow gateways, some kind of dumb nodes that only download and seed, following the example of Bitcoin or Burst and you reward based on seeds etc etc. Then we can get those nodes to improve this network and then get a token/coin for doing it.

1565163816_1JwnMobAn82kxrY5FXnjwMBFbLyzi.body:
anonymity and dehumanizing, that helps to be mean. Same principle on those social media bullying.

People have sad lives in general, if they can beat up verbally at something that shapes like a monkey but does not respond, and they can be the hero of the day ... why not, then I get my shot of dopamine and the feeling that I did some social justice by bullying that thing on my screen.

If you want to be sure people behaves, try to get them confronted face to face, never via cold screens it calls out the worst of most of us.

1565329400_194xi8BJsLXhwje1kBJETKo6tjvhH.body:
those ideas they die by themselves, at the end of the day, the liberalism will triumph over those because it is more malleable and adaptable. Did you know that the nazis end up against each other when the resources run out?
Also the secret of success with our species is based on the capacity to absorb and assimilate other "tribes", give that a thought. 
Why Romans became huge? Absorb the nearby tribes and gave them roman citizenship (of course they had people opposing)
Why Spanish became huge? Absorb the new world (Aztecs Mayas, etc) and of course some people opposed them
Why USA is currently huge?  Absorb mostly at the beginning Europeans and Jewish, then the free slaves. If the white supremacy keeps pushing they will destroy (guess who was opposing in previous empires ... food for thought)

- leave greediness at the door, just hunt and crack for the fun

1565639606_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body: please inform yourself, this is a libertarian system. Communism is a centralized government, that turns to be a dictatorship from the workers

> [mido](#comment_8_1G2nXDHaHSiL2SV5w9jy1tWddBS5EegZMw): communist society is absence of social classes, money, and the state.

Communism IS the dictatorship of the workers class over the other classes.

> [rcastanonz](#comment_19_1PGFKCfMSL1QdudndfYCo4mGM8E8XKzMMG): Libertarism is not the only answer; Kropotkin talks about Anarcho-Comunism in which common resources are used by people according to their necessities without a central institution, state or goverment. I think of ZeroNet as a Global Village where each one put content at everyone's dispossal so they can take advantage of it.

did you see the disgusting things they uploaded already? and worst to come. The anarcho-bullshit is just an excuse to get the strong bully the rest with no consequences. Guest what ... anarcho-comunism is already observed in nature and it is pure chaos.

Facts:

- Low all time criminality  
- War is obsolete and we won't see a major war

He knows America is run by Nazis (not Trump, I mean post-Paperclip boomers raised on old-school nazi teachings) but chances are equally likely some Ukranian billionaire has it sitting in a barn somewhere. Who really knows?

Man, you are a cool person to talk to! Thanks for being around this net

1566570350_1Dssbq2y2JDD14aojGG9RX3d5EPpw.body:
well, we are going over stages. If you see the overall as a species we are too young.
I don't think it is cancer, what some religions try to do is to keep some kind of positive humanity and penalize the bad side of the humanity, the one that abuse its power against kids for example, or the ones that don't see the need of help others but to use the upper hand to feel superior.

The religion did that job during a time, nowadays we have people smart enough to understand that if there is god or not it is just irrelevant, the important thing is to respect others and do your best on the time you have to live and share with other human beings.

I always defend, if religion makes you a better person, and allows you to understand that helping others is part of our live ... then I don't see religion as cancer.

1569442712_1DXjRGbVDrJjUQd4ZzmFF1vvQUvqs.body:
it is because you are not living in a democracy, you are living in a representative governance
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representative_democracy

Even in the wiki they got it wrong, it is not the same an indirect democracy or representative government than a true democracy. The problem of the democracy that you think we live on, is that it does not scale (it didn't work that well in old Greece, imagine in a current state with +100k souls)

What happens, democracy is a peoples dream, you get to say yes or no for each law and you have (as individual) the last word. Then what the  governments did in the modern ages was very simple, they replace the meaning of democracy to get you confused. Don't get me wrong, I rather prefer to live in the current system than a democracy, just to give you a hint, a bad actor (like the mafia) would also have a say on something ... and if they want to push their agenda they will .. and I rather prefer to have a system where eventually you can get back to your representative via lobby or on elections.

1572696653_1HvReABeo2mV6ZTQiUJhcmpzrxd4F.body:
> [pineapples](#comment_103_19XCfah7iuo9zYqk7GoTDXVNp4p5BpEH1T): i think that in situations like this, the goal should be figuring out a system where people can be united but also have autonomy.  everyone is different and its impossible to force everyone to be the same however everyone benefits from working together.  This is why you need to be able to have your own beliefs while at the same time work with everyone else.  this is why countries come together to form bodies like the UN, NATO, and BRICS. On a smaller scale, the states in the united states come together to form the united states.  this is why governments exist in the first place.  im not sure what is happening in catalunya most likely because it does not make a good story for the news.  can you explain what is happening please? si es mas facil para ti, hablo espanol.

Easy to explain, it is just the standard pre-dark period of time Spain faces each cycle.
First cycle is during the short first Spanish Republic  11 February 1873 and 29 December 1874 during that short time the federalism idea on Spain spark and some regions ofc Catalan region too, decided to become a country, then it came a military dictatorship and undid everything leading Spain to a restoration of monarchy and back to square one. 
Second cycle was in the "recent" second Republic 1931 to 1939 where the catalan decided to again set the path aside and break with Spain, after that a cruel civil war in Spain lead to Franco's dictatorship and 40 years of repression (btw it was also from within the same catalan too). 
Now after the longest period of peace in Spain, they are showing the true face, dictatorial system based on the will of brainwashed people. 

When you read the actual history, catalan is always been Spain but they always tried to set themselves apart mostly when Spain lost all its colonies, they subscribe to all the totalitarian ideas from the Nazis to the extreme right anglophone, they come from the idea that they are genetically superior to the rest of the Spain (anglophone extreme right) to that the will of the chosen people (Nazi). They also have an extreme vertical structure where the top decides and the rest follows, and if you try to rebate they simply outcast you.

Current status, Catalonia has the highest independence, they even REJECTED more independence from Spain back in the 90s when they offer a new financial system where they will only pay a fee but they govern their own destiny. Now they complain to one of the top 20 democracies of the world of being totalitarian, but the joke comes of the referendum they voted, they technically voted for dropping the current democratic system with their rights and european citineship for a dictatorship, it clearly states in the document that they will reject the supreme court of catalonia and impose its own, selected by the leader of the party. As any person will understand, a democracy won't allow to get dropped and go for a dictatorship.

Now one of the prosper regions of Spain became nothing and a beautiful city like Barcelona is no longer a place to go.
which one, the one you just made up and push with manipulated past and fake news?
